member.name: T:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.frmAdminControls
member.summary: Admin control form used to manage administrators, movie titles, and view overdue movies in the system.

member.summary: Initializes the Admin Controls form and registers the load event.

member.name: M:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.frmAdminControls.FrmAdminControls_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Loads all admin, movie, and overdue lists when the form opens.

member.name: M:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.frmAdminControls.RefreshAdminList
member.summary: Refreshes the list of administrator users. Displays only users with admin privileges.

member.summary: Refreshes the list of all movie titles in the library.

member.name: M:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.frmAdminControls.RefreshOverdueList
member.summary: Refreshes the list of overdue movies. Displays movies that are checked out and past their due date.

member.summary: Adds a new administrator user to the system.

member.summary: Removes the selected administrator from the system.

member.summary: Adds a new movie title to the movie library.

member.summary: Removes the selected movie title from the library.

member.summary: Closes the Admin Controls form and returns to the rental store.

member.summary: Currently logged-in user.

member.summary: Currently selected movie from the library.

member.summary: Loads users and movies when the form opens. Enables admin controls if the user has admin privileges.

member.summary: Refreshes the movie combo box to show only movies that are not currently checked out.

member.summary: Checks in the currently selected movie and updates the database.

member.name: T:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.Movie
member.summary: Represents a movie in the rental store. Tracks checkout status, due date, and overdue state.

member.name: P:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.Movie.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the movie.

member.name: P:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.Movie.IsCheckedOut
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the movie is currently checked out.

member.name: P:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.Movie.DueDate
member.summary: Gets the due date for the movie. Returns null if the movie is not checked out.

member.name: P:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.Movie.IsOverdue
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the movie is overdue.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.Movie.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified title.

member.name: M:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.Movie.CheckOut(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks out the movie for the specified number of days.
member.param: Number of days until the movie is due.

member.name: M:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.Movie.CheckIn
member.summary: Checks the movie back in and clears its due date.

member.name: M:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.Movie.ToString
member.summary: Returns the movie title.

member.name: T:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.MovieLibraryDB
member.summary: Provides in-memory storage and management for the movie library. This class is responsible for loading and saving movie data.

member.summary: Gets or sets the list of movies available in the library.

member.name: M:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.MovieLibraryDB.LoadMovies
member.summary: Loads the movie list into memory. If the movie list is empty, default movies are added.

member.name: M:GroupOneMovieStoreAppFinal.MovieLibraryDB.SaveMovies
member.summary: Would save the added movie list but we did not do this for this project.

member.summary: Provides helper methods for validating user input.
